name: Cave Swing Ludum Dare
description:
Cave Swing is a game developed in 48 hours by Ajmal Rizni for Ludum Dare 34.

Left Click to shoot the rope and hold the right mouse button to reel yourself in. Collect as many coins as you can and get to the last level!

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=p...
